goals__remit: BRILL was established in July 2016 following the UK EU referendum vote. It has approximately 1100 British nationals as members living and/or working in Luxembourg. Our objective is to secure and maintain our existing rights as EU citizens following Brexit, as well as those of EU 27 nationals living in the UK
relevant_communication:
Participation in  
Regular meetings with the Article 50 Task Force in Brussels (May, June, September, November 2017, January 2018) Events at the European Parliament (May, September, 2017, February 2018)  
An event in Luxembourg on Brexit and citizens' rights organised by MEP Charles Goerens on 8.11.2017 
A co-hosted event on Brexit and citizens' rights with the UK embassy in Luxembourg on 22 February 2018  
The Festival des Migrations, Luxembourg, 3-4 March, 2018
